column4: can somebody PLEASE help me with my display or give me the name of a channel dedicated to such a thing
What is your problem?
The window borders are transparent and some windows (like the terminal) are a yellow green and displays no text
ok Ill give it a try
Then, right-click the icon and "Select Window Manager". Tell us which window manager is on use
I can't tell you how annoying it is to run terminal commands when I can't see what I'm doing lol
You could also install fusion-icon via Synaptic
Wow I feel smart now. That's what I get for neglecting my morning coffee
:D do you want to move to #ubuntu-offtopic to chat about your coffee with me?
You said run it with alt+F2 right? And as long as you'll still help me with this then yes lol
After you have installed 'fusion-icon', run it by pressing ALT+F2 then typing 'fusion-icon'
Alt+F2 isn't bringing anything up
I'm using 10.04 if that changes anything
Ohh..weard. Then run it from Applications-->System tools-->Compiz Fusion Icon
its in the task bar, but it wont open a window
Right-Click it
Ah you rock it works now
Good. Then click the Select Window Manager and tell me what is selected?
it was 'compiz' but I changed it to metacity and reloaded it, and now it works perfectly :D
Excellent.
Indeed
